About Privacy & Policy Version 1.1.2 For details of our privacy policy, please visit
here
Tap to start the next step
Introduction What is this game? Game Requirements? This is a party game for everyone!

In this party game, players will draw and guess respectively, from their previous players.

After every one finishes, check out who's drawing and guessing is the most ridiculous and hilarious!!

No need to spend a lot of time learning, anyone can start this game and enjoy in 30 seconds.

So what is the goal of the game? Well, it is not to win, but to have fun!!! Minimum Player: 4

Maximum Players: 12

Tools: Your Phone
How to play? Step 1 Step 2 Step 3 Step 4 Step 5 Step 6
You can start the games in 2 ways. In the main menu, either create a game for others to join, or search and join an existing game your friend created. After every player has joined the game, the creator can start the game In the 1st round, every one should think about a topic and type it into the input box and wait until the time at the top finishes (time amount is one of the room settings of room master) Then, in the 2nd round, the topic will be delivered to the next player automatically, where players will see the topic from some one, and will need to turn the words into a hand-drawing for the next player to guess what it is 

Note: 

odd-numbered players and even-numbered players will have slightly different rules 

Odd-Numbered Players: All players will set a topic and the topic will be delivered to the next player automatically in this 2nd round 

Even-Numbered pLayers: All players will set a topic, but the players will have to turn the topic they set in the 1st round into a drawing in this 2nd round 

The rest of the game is the same for both odd-numbered players and even-numbered playerss In the 3rd round, all players will receive a drawing from some one in the game, and your goal is to guess what the drawing is about 

Hint: There will be word count as hint The game will continue with rounds 2 and 3 one after the other until each topic goes through all players in the game 

After every one finishes, each player will have all the drawings and guessings related to the topic they set in the 1st round. 

Please swipe left to see how to use the results to enjoy the best part of this game!!
Show the Results Step 1 Step 2 Step 3 Step 4
After the game finishes, every player will have the results (drawings and guessings) related to the topic they set in the 1st round 

Go to the first drawing, let every one guess what the drawing is without knowing the real answer(topic) Continue along with the results one by one to see who is the rotten apple that spoils the barrel!!! Finally, show the final answer to every player Well the above is the recommended way to present the results 

But you can present the results however you like! 

The point is...... Have Fun!
